content: this is free pattern for a little 4 leaf clover or shamrock i was inspired to design this thinking about st patrick s day and my grandpa i called him papa for this pattern you will just need a little bit of yarn of your choice and an appropriately sized hook i have used * 606 grass green - scheepjes maxi sweet treat 100% mercerised cotton 25g/140m with a 1 5mm hook * 015 grassland - scheepjes catona chroma 100% mercerised cotton 50g/125m with a 3mm hook * 2014 emerald or 1826 shamrock i am not sure i don t have the label anymore - scheepjes chunky monkey 100% premium acrylic anti pilling 100g/116m with a 5mm hook * 325 baklava - scheepjes scrumptious 50% recycled polyester recycled plastic bottles x 50% acrylic with a 3 5mm hook gauge is not critical for this project but the size of your clover will depend on your yarn hook and gauge my sweet treats little clover is about 1 5in 4cm catona chroma about 3in 7 5cm and chunky monkey about 5in 12 5cm the pattern is free on my website https //jessicawifall com/2024/03/17/little-clover-free-pattern/ 1 1 https //jessicawifall com/2024/03/17/little-clover-free-pattern/
